attributes.action: Introduce legislation to limit the maximum design speed of all new public road-going motor vehicles to 70 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only possible exemptions being Police and other Emergency Services vehicles.  At a stroke this will cut pollution, reduce the "attractiveness" of extremely long commuting: increasing the uptake of housing on brown field sites and giving people in rural areas more opportunity to buy local houses.
